headline: Energy Sector Drags as Oil Prices Weigh on Profits

headline: Rubber Process Oil Market is Projected with a Value of USD 3.40 Billion by 2032, Driven by Expanding Tyre Manufacturing Demand | Report by SNS Insider
summary: Surge in eco-friendly Tyre production and shift to low-PAH oils are accelerating demand, alongside rising infrastructure and industrial rubber use.Austin, July 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Rubber Process Oil Market Size was valued at USD 2.43 billion in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 3.40 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 4.28% over the forecast period of 2025-2032.
